item.title: [PI] Can someone fix my code
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

Ok I’m making an OverloadBase for PI.
And I want to make the potion unstackable
like u can get more lvl by drinking more
I did this code but he’s not working can someone help me Sorry if You didnt understand My native language is not english

if (c.playerLevel[0] + Attack > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + Attack + 1) { c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + Attack; c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); }

Read full topic
